sources.title: Madrid's Barrio Salamanca, the most valued and distinguished neighbourhood - Journal - IVORY Homes
sources.snippet: All of this means that property prices in the Salamanca district are the highest in Madrid and Recoletos in particular is one of the most expensive districts in Spain, reaching over €8,000 per square metre. However, this has not put a brake on the real estate market in this area, which continues to attract potential buyers, both Spanish and foreign, who want to invest or take up residence in this exclusive neighbourhood. There is a wide range of properties for rent in the Barrio ...

sources.title: Salamanca (Madrid) - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Salamanca is in the outer area of the Rondas, where the neighborhoods of Guindalera and Fuente del Berro originated with more spontaneous urban development. Nowadays, the Salamanca district is one of the wealthiest areas in Madrid and some of its streets, such as Goya or Serrano, are some of the most expensive streets in Spain...
